content:
We have been bugfixing lately and we come up with a new improved version of the fhir-net-api: 1.7.0

For a complete list, please visit the pages with the release notes:

STU3: https://github.com/FirelyTeam/fhir-net-api/releases/tag/v1.7.0-stu3
R4: https://github.com/FirelyTeam/fhir-net-api/releases/tag/v1.7.0-r4
There is also a 1.7.0 for DSTU2 but that is there to retain binary compatibility with the newer shared assemblies but has none of the new features.

:star: And wait, that is not all.. we have also released a beta version of FHIR R5 (preview #2 of FHIR R5 - 2020 May). The release notes are here: https://github.com/FirelyTeam/fhir-net-api/releases/tag/v1.7.0-beta-may2020-r5. You can find the binaries on NuGet: https://www.nuget.org/packages/Hl7.Fhir.R5/1.7.0-beta-may2020

Happy coding from Firely
